languages.text: Увы, даже самые опытные следопыты не смогли определить направление, с которого пришел отряд. После двух часов блужданий они, выбившись из сил, вновь вышли к остову пустотного судна.
Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.
languages.original_text: Увы, даже самые опытные следопыты не смогли определить направление, с которого пришел отряд. После двух часов блужданий они, выбившись из сил, вновь вышли к остову пустотного судна.

traits.locale_text: Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.
Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.
Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.
Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.

languages.text: 遗憾的是，即便是最有经验的追踪者，也无法分辨队伍当初是从哪个方向来的。一群人漫无目的地徘徊了两个小时，最终再次筋疲力尽地回到了失事的虚空舰附近。
languages.original_text: Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，即便是最有经验的追踪者，也无法分辨队伍当初是从哪个方向来的。一群人漫无目的地徘徊了两个小时，最终再次筋疲力尽地回到了失事的虚空舰附近。

languages.text: 不幸にも、最も経験豊富な追跡者でさえ一行が来た方角を見失う。2時間彷徨った末、疲労困憊で難破したヴォイドシップに帰還する。
languages.original_text: Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.

traits.locale_text: 不幸にも、最も経験豊富な追跡者でさえ一行が来た方角を見失う。2時間彷徨った末、疲労困憊で難破したヴォイドシップに帰還する。

languages.text: Por desgracia, ni siquiera los rastreadores más duchos son capaces de discernir hacia dónde fue el grupo. Tras caminar dos horas sin rumbo, regresan exhaustos a la nave del vacío varada.
languages.original_text: Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.

traits.locale_text: Por desgracia, ni siquiera los rastreadores más duchos son capaces de discernir hacia dónde fue el grupo. Tras caminar dos horas sin rumbo, regresan exhaustos a la nave del vacío varada.

languages.text: Hélas, même les pisteurs les plus expérimentés sont incapables de déterminer d'où est venu le groupe. Ils reviennent épuisés à l'épave du vaisseau après deux heures de recherches infructueuses.
languages.original_text: Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.

traits.locale_text: Hélas, même les pisteurs les plus expérimentés sont incapables de déterminer d'où est venu le groupe. Ils reviennent épuisés à l'épave du vaisseau après deux heures de recherches infructueuses.

languages.text: Leider können selbst die erfahrensten Spurenleser nicht ermitteln, woher die Gruppe ursprünglich kam. Nach zwei Stunden kehren sie erschöpft zu dem Raumschiffwrack zurück.
languages.original_text: Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.

traits.locale_text: Leider können selbst die erfahrensten Spurenleser nicht ermitteln, woher die Gruppe ursprünglich kam. Nach zwei Stunden kehren sie erschöpft zu dem Raumschiffwrack zurück.

languages.text: Ne yazık ki en deneyimli iz sürücüler bile grubun hangi yönden geldiğini anlayamıyor. İki saat dolaştıktan sonra yorulmuş hâlde uçsuz gemisi enkazına dönüyorlar.
languages.original_text: Alas, even the most experienced trackers fail to discern from which direction the party came. After two hours of wandering, they return, exhausted, to the wrecked voidship.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki en deneyimli iz sürücüler bile grubun hangi yönden geldiğini anlayamadı. İki saat dolaştıktan sonra yorulmuş bir şekilde uçsuz gemisi enkazına geri döndüler.
